item.description: The Confederazione Italiana-Giovani Italiani is chartering a bus for the parade in NYC. Bus ticket is $ 29.00pp breakfast included. The bus will be leaving at 7:30am from the Wethersfield Shopping Center, Silas Deane Hwy., Wethersfield. Returning trip will be leaving NY at 6:30pm. This will give us enough time to see the parade, have lunch and shop! Please sent a check made out to: CIGI, at 639 Ridge Rd., Wethersfield, CT. 06109 no later than Sept. 1st. to reserve your seat. For more info. or question, please do not hesitate to call 860.513.1203. Grazie, Tina Marzano CIGI
item.name: NYC Columbus Day Parade - Chartered Bus
